installed_cost_source.notes: Assume a 9 W lamp (wattage for 2020 'typical' residential 60 W-equivalent general service LED lamps from EIA document); 9 W/lamp * 226 lm/W (target in Table 2 of BTO MYPP) = 2034 lm/lamp; convert $0.271/1000 lm to $/9W (60 W-equivalent) lamp
